src:
AP Top Science News at 12:35 a.m. EST
05 Nov 2019, 05:00 by EndPlay
Boeing crew capsule completes major flight test in desert
Wine cellar in space: 12 bottles arrive for year of aging
US tells UN it is pulling out of Paris climate deal
Trump administration eases Obama-era rules on coal pollution
Study: Alien grasses are making more frequent US wildfires
Time ticks away at wild bison genetic diversity
Space shipment launched with sports car parts, cookie oven
3 ancient shipwrecks discovered off Aegean island of Kasos
3-2-1-Cookoff! Astronauts to bake cookies with new test oven
Scientists retract study suggesting mutation shortens life
Copyright 2019 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
